column1: '''Shaun Gunner''' is the tenth and current Chair of [[The Tolkien Society]].<ref name="Twitter"/> He is also the Society's publicity officer, and was the Deputy Chair of [[The Return of the Ring
column2: The Return of the Ring: Celebrating Tolkien in 2012]].<ref>Lyn Whitaker, "Along the Road", [[Amon Hen 234
column3: ''Amon Hen'' 234]], p. 8</ref> He is an administrator ([[User:Mith]]) of the [[Tolkien Gateway]] website, and an advisor and assistant to [[Emil Johansson]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings Project]].<ref>Shaun Gunner, "Member Profile", [[Amon Hen 235
column4: ''Amon Hen'' 235]], pp. 33-34</ref> He has also contributed to the journals ''[[Amon Hen]]'', ''[[Hither Shore]]'', and ''[[Mallorn (journal)
